title: The PPR Search Summary Results List Schema

matchType.description: Specifies how closely the result matches the query criteria.

registrationNumber.description: The registration number for a Financing Statement, Change Statement, or Amendment Statement. Included if searching by registration number. Identical to baseRegistrationNumber if it is for a Financing Statement.

baseRegistrationNumber.description: The Base Registration Number uniquely identifies a Financing Statement. Included for draft Amendment and Change Statements.

registrationType.description: Specifies the type of Financing Statement.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the PPR system, the date and time the financing statement is created.

selected.description: May be set to true for SIMILAR match types to indictate the Financing Statement is to be included in the search detail results (search step 2)..
